real-estate.outlook: Strong regeneration pipeline across Greater Manchester and Liverpool City Region. Manchester leading UK regional office market. Significant BTR and residential delivery around transport hubs. Stockport, Salford, and Wirral seeing major mixed-use schemes.

rail.outlook: Transformational investment in Bee Network integration. Metrolink extensions to Stockport and Airport Western Link progressing. HS2 Crewe Hub remains committed. Northern Powerhouse Rail connecting Manchester-Liverpool under development.

utilities.outlook: United Utilities delivering largest ever AMP8 programme at £13.7bn. SP Energy Networks major investment in ScotWind connections and RIIO-ED2. Electricity North West grid reinforcement for data centres and EV.

data-centres.outlook: Manchester emerging as major UK data centre market outside London. Multiple hyperscale developments in planning around M62 corridor. Power availability and fibre connectivity driving location decisions.

infrastructure.outlook: Significant flood defence investment across Lancashire and Cumbria. NHS estate transformation with new hospitals. School rebuilding programme active. Waste infrastructure for circular economy targets.

opportunities.title: MediaCityUK Phase 2 - Expansion
opportunities.fundingStatus: Fully funded - Peel L&P private investment
opportunities.description: Major expansion of MediaCityUK with new studios, offices, residential towers, and public realm. 2,500 homes and 1.5m sq ft commercial space.

opportunities.title: Liverpool Paddington Village
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - Liverpool City Council, private developers
opportunities.description: 30-acre innovation district adjacent to Royal Liverpool Hospital. Life sciences, education, residential, and commercial development.

opportunities.title: Wirral Waters - Peel L&P Masterplan
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - Peel L&P, Levelling Up Fund, Town Deal
opportunities.description: 500-acre regeneration of Birkenhead docks. 13,000 homes, commercial, maritime, and energy. Multiple phases over 30 years.

opportunities.title: Stockport Town Centre West Regeneration
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - SMBC, Homes England, CRSTS
opportunities.description: Major regeneration around new Metrolink stop. 3,500 homes, transport interchange, commercial and public realm.

opportunities.title: Manchester Airport Terminal 2 Transformation
opportunities.description: Terminal 2 transformation programme. New pier, terminal extension, and facilities. Final phases completing.

opportunities.title: HS2 Crewe Hub Station
opportunities.description: HS2 hub station at Crewe with classic-compatible services. Station and associated infrastructure works.

opportunities.title: Metrolink Stockport & Airport Western Link
opportunities.description: New Metrolink extensions to Stockport town centre and Airport Western Link via Wythenshawe.

opportunities.title: United Utilities AMP8 Programme
opportunities.description: Largest ever investment programme. Major storm overflow improvements, water treatment upgrades, and network resilience across the North West.

opportunities.title: Haweswater Aqueduct Resilience Programme
opportunities.description: Replacement of critical 100km aqueduct from Lake District to Manchester. Tunnel boring and pipeline construction.

opportunities.title: Bee Network Bus Franchising Infrastructure
opportunities.description: Bus depots, fleet procurement, bus priority corridors, interchange improvements across Greater Manchester.

opportunities.title: SP Energy Networks RIIO-ED2 North West
opportunities.description: ED2 capital programme for SP Energy Networks Manweb licence area. Substations, reinforcement, smart grid.

opportunities.title: Electricity North West ED2 Programme
opportunities.description: ED2 capital programme for Electricity North West. Major grid reinforcement for data centres and electrification.

opportunities.title: Manchester Piccadilly Station Redevelopment
opportunities.fundingStatus: Subject to Network Rail and HS2 decisions
opportunities.description: Major station redevelopment to accommodate HS2 services. New platforms, concourse, and commercial development.

opportunities.title: Preston Western Distributor & South Lancaster
opportunities.fundingStatus: Funded - Lancashire CC, Homes England, HIF
opportunities.description: New road linking A583 to A6 via M55 junction. Under construction. Unlocks 5,000 homes at Cottam.

opportunities.title: Peel Ports Liverpool2 Phase 2
opportunities.fundingStatus: Subject to Peel Ports investment decision
opportunities.description: Second phase of deep-water container terminal. Additional berths and capacity for post-Panamax vessels.

opportunities.title: BAE Systems Barrow Submarine Programme Infrastructure
opportunities.description: Shipyard infrastructure for Dreadnought-class and AUKUS submarines. New construction hall, covered facility, and site-wide improvements.

opportunities.title: Manchester Data Centre Campus - Kao Data
opportunities.fundingStatus: Fully funded - Kao Data / Legal & General
opportunities.description: Hyperscale data centre campus in East Manchester. 50MW+ capacity with expansion potential.

opportunities.title: Bolton Town Centre Regeneration
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - Bolton Council, Town Deal £22.9m, Future High Streets
opportunities.description: Mixed-use regeneration including Central Street development, Crompton Place transformation, and new housing.

opportunities.title: Warrington Town Centre Masterplan
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - Warrington BC, LEP, private developers
opportunities.description: Comprehensive town centre masterplan including Southern Gateway, Stadium Quarter, and waterside development.

opportunities.title: Liverpool Waters - Peel L&P
opportunities.fundingStatus: Part funded - Peel L&P, Everton FC stadium, private developers
opportunities.description: 60-hectare regeneration of historic docklands. Everton Stadium at Bramley-Moore Dock. 9,000 homes, 300,000 sqm commercial.

opportunities.title: Bee Network Active Travel Programme
opportunities.description: 1,800 miles of cycling and walking routes across Greater Manchester. Protected cycleways and crossings.

opportunities.title: Network Rail CP7 North West Programme
opportunities.description: CP7 renewals and enhancements across North West & Central route. Track, signalling, structures, and stations.

opportunities.title: Trafford Park Data Centre Campus
opportunities.description: Multi-hall colocation data centre campus on Trafford Park. 40MW capacity.

opportunities.title: Liverpool Bus Franchising Infrastructure

opportunities.title: A66 Trans-Pennine Dualling
opportunities.description: Dualling remaining single-carriageway sections of A66 between M6 and A1(M). Multiple scheme sections.

opportunities.title: Cumbria Flood Resilience Programme
opportunities.description: Major flood defence improvements across Cumbria including Carlisle, Kendal, Cockermouth, and Keswick schemes.

opportunities.description: Multiple hospital rebuilds and refurbishments across North West including Royal Liverpool completion and Lancashire Teaching Hospitals.

opportunities.title: Wirral Freeport Connectivity

opportunities.description: Multiple office and residential schemes in Piccadilly area SRF. Grade A office development.

opportunities.title: Lancaster South Growth Catalyst

opportunities.description: Ongoing nuclear decommissioning and risk reduction at Sellafield. Major construction programme for waste treatment facilities.

opportunities.description: Offshore wind manufacturing and assembly port facility. Support for Irish Sea wind farms.
